title: WTB: Nashville SL  also any of the 4  Cobbs

posts.post_title: WTB: Nashville SL  also any of the 4  Cobbs
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy Nashville SL cards of  Harry Bay, Bill Bernhard, Roy Ellam, Hub Perdue


poor,good or vg  looking for all backs. graded preferred but will look at raw


Thanks Doug


Also looking for any of the 4 Cobbs poor thru good. may consider vg


Been a few years since i have been on here. Want to get back into collecting. Kids have now graduated college!!
